00019     ~PoissonModel() {
00020       set<DiffusionMaterial *> UNIQUEmaterials;
00021       for (uint i =0; i < _materials.size(); i++) 
00022     UNIQUEmaterials.insert(_materials[i]);
00023     
00024       for (set<DiffusionMaterial *>::iterator it = UNIQUEmaterials.begin();
00025        it != UNIQUEmaterials.end(); it++) 
00026         delete (*it);
00027     };
00028 
00030     // From constant value
00031     void initializeField(const Real value = 0.0) {
00032       _field.assign(_field.size(), value);
00033     };
00034 
00036     void initializeField(const Real* value) {
00037       _field.assign(value, value+_field.size());
00038     };
00039 
00041     // From solution array (Used by Solver)
00042     void linearizedUpdate(const Real* localValues, 
00043               const Real* ghostValues) {
00044       const int nLocalDof = (_myMesh->getLocalDoF()).size();
00045       for(uint i = 0; i < nLocalDof; i++)
00046     _field[i] += localValues[i];
00047       for(uint i = 0; i < (_myMesh->getGhostDoF()).size(); i++)
00048     _field[i + nLocalDof] += ghostValues[i];
00049     };
00050 
00051     // One value at the time (Node ID, dof index, value)
00052     void linearizedUpdate(const int id, const int dof, const Real value) {
00053       assert( id < _field.size() && dof == 0 );
00054       _field[id] += value;
00055     }
00056 
00057     void setField(uint dof, Real value) {
00058       _field[dof] = value;
00059     }
00060 
00061     void PrintField() {
00062       for (uint i = 0; i < _field.size(); i++)
00063     cout << _field[i] << endl;
00064     }
00065
